title: First.Aid.Kit.iTunes.Festival.2014.1080p.AC3.5.1
description:
There's not much to add to the title of the video. In fact, I haven't even watched it yet. But I am 99.9% certain that it will play correctly. It wouldn't have played correctly if I'd trusted Windows Explorer to copy a file. Instead I had to use my own "home made" file copying utility in order to put the file where I wanted it (which was on a different drive).

After that the conversion to AVI (source was a TS file and an AC3 file) instead of bringing up a Blue Screen, brought up this AVI instead.

The entire concert is 44:08 minutes long and here are the details:
